rows: An icon to display at the start of the input. Do not use with `leadingText` at the same time.
Short text to display at the start of the input. Wrap the text in a `<span>`. Do not use with `leadingIcon` at the same time.
An icon to display at the end of the input. Do not use with `trailingText` at the same time.
Short text to display at the end of the input. Wrap the text in a `<span>`. Do not use with `trailingIcon` at the same time.
